resources.string:
This is a keyboard designed to help who have such a hard time with spellingthat sometimes their guesses can\'t even get close enough for auto correct to suggest something useful. This is quite common for people with dyslexia or dysgraphia,

This keyboard allows you to type words phonetically, using the international phonetic alphabet (IPA). As you type the auto correct will suggest to you correctly spelled words that start with the pronunciation of the ipa symbols you typed

To use this keyboard you have to 1) enable it in the settings of the device and 2) select it from the list of enabled keyboards when you are entering text. The two buttons below will take you directly to the two required screens.

You also need to build the pronunciation database on the first use. This should hawe started on its own, and you should see a progress bar below. If it hasn\'t, you can touch the build dictionary button.
